--# Contributing to MyPackage

Thank you for considering contributing to ClusterApp! We appreciate your help.

## Reporting Issues

If you encounter a bug or have a feature request, please open an issue on the [issue tracker](https://github.com/JohannaMz/ClusterApp/issues).

## Contributing Code

1. Fork the repository.
2. Create a new branch for your feature or bug fix.
3. Make your changes and create a pull request.
4. Ensure your code follows our coding guidelines (see [Coding Style](#coding-style)).
5. Make sure your pull request is accompanied by tests, if applicable.
6. Await review and feedback from the maintainers.

## Coding Style

Please follow the coding style used in the package, and adhere to the [R Style Guide](https://style.tidyverse.org/).

## Contact

If you have any questions or need help, feel free to contact me at [johanna@maertz.eu].

Thank you for your contributions!
